title: George Soros: Trump will win the popular vote by a land slide, but Clinton Victor is a free deal.
subtitle: A modified video that distorts the words of the billionaire democracy George Soros to create the impression that he conspired against the 2016 presidential election.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The billionaire George Soros predicted that Donald Trump would win the popular vote with landslides, but he would lose to Hillary Clinton because the elections were forged.
